subject: Move Install/Update buttons to their own row below the title
body:
Relocates the PWA Install and Update buttons from the header icon row
(alongside Refresh/Settings) to a dedicated full-width row between the
title and the Create/Join action buttons. This gives them better
visibility and a cleaner header layout.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01Ar27WUdXAMUG4Hn52Ajtev
title: Move Install/Update buttons to their own row below the title
